actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase by 8 cents per pack the Federal excise tax on cigarettes and to provide that revenues from the additional tax shall be deposited in the Federal Hospital Insurance Trust Fund under the Social Security Act.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to impose an additional excise tax on cigarettes. Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to appropriate revenues from such additional tax to the Federal Hospital Insurance Trust Fund.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase by 8 cents per pack the Federal excise tax on cigarettes and to provide that revenues from the additional tax shall be deposited in the Federal Hospital Insurance Trust Fund under the Social Security Act.
